```{r}
#| message: false
# Read and format data
resources <- readr::read_csv("resources.csv") |>
  dplyr::mutate(
    LinkText = stringr::str_remove_all(Link, "https://|/$"),
    Link = glue::glue("<a href='{Link}' target = '_blank'>{LinkText}</a>")
  ) |>
  dplyr::select(-LinkText) |> 
  dplyr::mutate(
    Category = stringr::str_replace(Category, ";", ", ")
  )

# Function to make table
resources_table <- function(choose_type, data = resources) {
  output <- data |>
    dplyr::filter(Type %in% choose_type) |>
    dplyr::select(-Type) |>
    dplyr::arrange(Title) |>
    reactable::reactable(
      columns = list(
        Link = reactable::colDef(
          html = TRUE
        )
      ),
      searchable = TRUE,
      striped = TRUE,
      pagination = FALSE,
      height = 500
    )
  return(output)
}
```


# Blogs

```{r}
resources_table("Blog")
```
